TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Matang, title = Matang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matang} }

S.FORM: Matang Itiniay i Taitung Cen no Taitung ko Matang a niyaro', 872 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 2,542 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 38% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 967 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 62% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,575 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 30%, Paiwan 3%, Bunun 1%, Puyuma 1%, roma 3%. O katadamaanan no niyaro'

Matang Itiniay i Taitong Cen no Taitong ko Matang a niyaro', 872 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 2,542 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 38% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 967 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 62% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,575 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 30%, Paiwan 3%, Bonon 1%, Poyoma 1%, roma 3%. O katadamaanan no niyaro'
